most_active_tickets.title: Unable to generate personal shareable links for 6+ months

common_issues.title: Personal shareable links broken for 6+ months
common_issues.description: Users are unable to generate personal shareable links across multiple Pieces applications. The issue stems from outdated infrastructure. A temporary fix was implemented, but a major infrastructure upgrade is planned for December to fully resolve the problem. Users experiencing persistent issues are advised to contact support.

related_issues.title: Unable to generate personal shareable links for 6+ months
related_issues.text:
Unable to generate personal shareable links for 6+ months
### Software

Desktop Application, Web Extension, VS Code, Sharing Web App

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

10.1.12

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I've been unable to generate shareable personal links and utilize the web sharing app since before June '24. I've created an issue about this twice before, and the last time was just completely disregarded and it was closed out.

Here is the screenshot from within my Pieces Desktop when trying to generate a personal link, as well as generate a GitHub Gist:

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0966a1a9-3076-4d9b-9006-88a14673cc9f)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation:

**Key Points:**

* Shareable links were malfunctioning for multiple users.
* Issues stemmed from outdated infrastructure.
* A temporary fix was implemented, with a more comprehensive upgrade planned for December.

**Problems Identified:**

* Shareable links were failing for users.
* Infrastructure powering shareable links was outdated.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* Temporary fix to address immediate issues (implemented November 8th).
* Major infrastructure upgrade planned for December.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* Temporary fix in place, addressing immediate concerns.
* Major upgrade forthcoming in December for further stability and feature enhancements.
* Some users continue to experience issues even after applying the latest fixes.

**Additional Notes:**

* V2 of the Shareable Links feature is being scoped for development with the intention of moving it out of beta.
* Users experiencing ongoing issues can contact @mark-at-pieces with their email address for further individual assistance.
* A separate issue regarding GitHub Gist generation has been identified and should be reported in a new issue with production logs attached.

recommendations: Investigate and address the root cause of the "Personal shareable links broken for 6+ months" issue as it has been persistent for a long time and is causing user frustration.
Prioritize the major infrastructure upgrade planned for December to fully resolve the shareable links issue.
Improve communication with users about the status of the shareable links issue and the planned fix.
Analyze the effectiveness of the temporary fix implemented for the shareable links issue and identify any potential improvements.
Review support processes to ensure timely responses and avoid disregarding user issues, as reported in ticket #443.
